channel.title: TestScape Compiler Error
channel.description:
Ok the last time I made this it got deleted because of innapropriate pictures (im sure you know what im talking about)
So the problem is: I keep installing JDK but every time I try to compile it either says "javac is not a recognized internal or external command" or "You do not have JDK 6.0 or 5.0 or any JDK 6.0 or 5.0 updates"
My CLASSPATH is: CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin;%CLASSPATH%; My PATH is: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.011\bin

item.title: TestScape Compiler Error
item.dc:creator: @Goth_Wolf Goth Wolf
item.description:
@Goth_Wolf wrote:

That mean’s it worked lol cept for the first 6 it tried

item.title: TestScape Compiler Error
item.dc:creator: @swordslam46 swordslam46
item.description:
@swordslam46 wrote:

[quote=“Goth Wolf, post:8, topic:254290”]use this compiler

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe" *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin\javac.exe" *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_08\bin\javac.exe" *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_09\bin\javac.exe" *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe" *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

It will go through all jdk versions till it find a working one it may say that it connot find the path file or whatever a couple times before or after it works lol depending on ur version[/quote]

The system could not find the path specified x6
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a depricated api
Note: Recompile with -xlint: deprication for details.
Press any key to continue…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 01, 2009, 03:15:12 pm[/size][hr]anyone?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 01, 2009, 09:53:47 pm[/size][hr]Can someone PLEASE help me

Read full topic

item.title: TestScape Compiler Error
item.dc:creator: @Goth_Wolf Goth Wolf
item.description:
@Goth_Wolf wrote:

use this compiler

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe" *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin\javac.exe" *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_08\bin\javac.exe" *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_09\bin\javac.exe" *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe" *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

It will go through all jdk versions till it find a working one it may say that it connot find the path file or whatever a couple times before or after it works lol depending on ur version

Read full topic

item.title: TestScape Compiler Error
item.dc:creator: @ETT ETT
item.description:
@ETT wrote:

You dont need anything classpathes i dont have classpath thing setupped.

Just go to C:\Program Files\Java and look up the latest JDK folder and copy and paste JDK folder name to everywhere of compiler where is another ALMOST same named thing.

Add me MSN if you get errors: E247412269632@hotmail.com

Read full topic
